title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 225-4.3 - Motor vehicle diesel fuel and motor vehicle diesel fuel additive standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 225-4.3 - Motor vehicle diesel fuel and motor vehicle diesel fuel additive standards

State Regulations

No motor vehicle diesel fuel may be sold or supplied in

New York State unless it complies with applicable provisions of 40 CFR part
80, subpart I (see Table 1, section
200.9
of this Title) commencing

June 1, 2006 for all refiners and importers supplying diesel fuel to the State
of New York, commencing July 15, 2006 for locations in the diesel fuel
distribution system downstream from refineries and import facilities except
retail outlets and wholesale purchaser- consumer facilities, and commencing

September 1, 2006 for retail outlets and wholesale purchaser-consumer
facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
225-4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
